text: Kate and Prince William already have three children together - Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis. As Prince William ’ s brother Prince Harry is expecting his first child with Meghan Markle, bookies have slashed the odds on the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge expecting a baby as well. Bookies Coral have released odds over a sudden announcement from the future King and Queen of England as the odds now shows the chance of Kate being pregnant at 1 / 2 - a 50 percent chance.
